name: Pathetic Prosthetics
description:
Completed in under  4 days for GMC Game Jam 39, 2020. Theme: Pathetic Creature

Less of a full thrilling game and more a proof of concept. There were many more ideas I didn't get time to implement but it is (hopefully) a playable game.  Best played with mouse and keyboard, music sounds better with headphones and art looks best with your eyes closed.

Music was written by me, and arranged by my mum (thanks mum)
All the rest was just me!

I appreciate all feedback and ideas! Thanks for playing!
